subject: Re: [junit] Can we have multiple runs for a single test method of the Unit test case
msgSnippet: ... Here is how you do it with TestNG: @Test(dataProvider = dp ) public void verifyFirstName(String name) { ... } @DataProvider(name = dp ) public Object[][]
messageBody:
On 11/24/05, Mohan Murali Krishna Bottu <mohan_bottu@...> wrote:
>
> Hello David,
>
> Thanks for your reply,
> I want to run the same code but with different data five times.


Here is how you do it with TestNG:

@Test(dataProvider = "dp")
public void verifyFirstName(String name) {
...
}

@DataProvider(name = "dp")
public Object[][] createFirstNames() {
return new Object[][] {
{ "Cedric" },
{ "Mohan"},
};
}

--
Cédric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
